domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text: @JoeBiden You, Bernie, et al debated the Green New Deal. You were against it at the time, but that was then, this is now, with CoViD-19 and the new Great Depression. We need both strong action on climate change AND a strong economic shot in the arm. Can we have a Green New Deal, please?
